content: The Indian stock market will remain closed for trading on October 21&22 on account of Diwali and Balipratipada. This means that both Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and National Stock Exchange (NSE) to remain shut for two days straight. Since Dhanteras falls on Sunday, October 19, both exchanges will remain closed. The multi-commodity exchange (MCX) and currency derivatives will also remain closed for trading for two days, due to Diwali on October 21 and Balipratipada on October 22.

title: Ukraine Claims Strike on Oil Refinery Complex in Russia’s Ufa | Company Business News
description: This business development signals important shifts in market dynamics. Ukraine Claims Strike on Oil Refinery Complex in Russia’s Ufa | Company Business News reflects strategic decisions that could influence competitive positioning and industry standards. The economic implications suggest potential ripple effects across related sectors. The artificial intelligence aspects of this development could
content: (Bloomberg) -- Ukraine’s forces struck a crude oil processing unit at a Bashneft refinery in Ufa, Bashkortostan, with drones early Saturday, according to a person familiar with the matter. The giant complex, part of the Rosneft energy group, is located about 1,750 kilometers (1,090 miles) from Kyiv and about 1,200 km east of Moscow. It was the third strike this year at that location, according to the person, who wasn’t authorized to speak publicly.
